treatments_requested.name: Psychiatric Inpatient Services
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Reimbursement for inpatient psychiatric services for behavioral health condition

treatments_tried_and_worked.name: Haloperidol
treatments_tried_and_worked.other_or_notes: Increased dosage led to patient being calmer and cooperative

rationale: The services were deemed medically necessary for the treatment of the patient's condition. The patient showed improvement with increased Haldol dosage and did not require ongoing inpatient hospitalization.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in psychiatry with sub-specialty certification in geriatric psychiatry, actively practicing, expert in treatment of Alzheimer's Disease.
